name: FinalProject
description: RPG tools for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition.

scripts.postinstall: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('install.ok', new Date().toISOString()); console.log('DEPLOY_MARKER Application: health-v1')"
scripts.start: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('start.ok', new Date().toISOString()); console.log('DEPLOY_MARKER Application: starting')" && node ./server/index.js
